l.n.TagType(object) : class documentation

Part of logsparser.normalizer View In Hierarchy

A tag type. This defines how to match a given tag.
Method __init__
def __init__(self, name, ttype, regexp, description={}, flags=re.UNICODEre.IGNORECASE):
Parametersnamethe tag type's name
ttypethe expected type of the value fetched by the associated regular expression
regexpthe regular expression (as text, not compiled) associated to this type
descriptiona dictionary holding multilingual descriptions of the tag type
flagsflags by which to compile the regular expression
